spec.description: Dashboard for Spring Batch applications instrumented with Micrometer

panels.description: Number of jobs that were finished with the corresponding statuses within all time eltex-jobs has been working for.
panels.title: Job Statuses

targets.expr: hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{ application="$application", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{ application="$application", pool="$hikaricp"}

spec.title: Eltex Jobs Dashboard
